item.title: 加快业务发展
item.description: 本系列月刊探讨法律生态系统如何利用新技术来满足快速变化的业务需求。在第 5 部分 "2024 "中，我们将介绍在合同和采购等日常流程中节省时间和金钱的 20 种工具。【原文：This monthly series examines how the legal ecosystem is using new technologies to serve fast-changing business needs. In part 5, 2024: we look at 20 tools that save time and money in everyday processes, including contracts and procurement】
